00068 tst::tst() {
00069   QMenu* myMenu = new QMenu("test");
00070   uio::mb()->insertMenu(uio::hm(),myMenu);
00071   QAction* myAction = new QAction ( "test1", this );
00072   myAction->setShortcut(QString("Ctrl+L"));
00073   //myAction->setStatusTip ( "" );
00074   connect(myAction,SIGNAL(triggered()),this,SLOT(slotTest1()));
00075   myMenu->addAction( myAction );
00076   uio::window()->showNormal();
00077 }

00079 void tst::slotTest1() {
00080   uio::hideGrid();
00081   //uio::axoView();
00082 
00083   TopoDS_Shape b,p;
00084   b = ballnose(30,5);
00085   p = silhouette(b,gp_Dir(0,sqrt(2),sqrt(2)));
00086 
00087   //std::string s = "Mass: ";
00088   //s += uio::stringify(mass(b));
00089   //uio::infoMsg(s);
00090   dispShape ds(p);
00091   ds.display();
00092   uio::axoView();
00093   uio::fitAll();
00094   uio::sleep(1);
00095   dispShape dt(b);
00096   dt.display();
00097   uio::fitAll();
00098 }

00101 TopoDS_Shape tst::ballnose(double len, double dia) {
00102   double r = dia / 2.0;
00103   TopoDS_Solid s,c;
00104   TopoDS_Shape tool;
00105   gp_Ax2 axis(gp_Pnt(0,0,r),gp::DZ()); //for cylinder. 0,0,r is the center of the bottom face
00106   s = TopoDS::Solid(BRepPrimAPI_MakeSphere(gp_Pnt(0,0,r),r).Solid());
00107   c = TopoDS::Solid(BRepPrimAPI_MakeCylinder(axis,r,len-r).Solid());
00108   tool = BRepAlgoAPI_Fuse(s,c);
00109   return tool;
00110 }
00111 
00121 TopoDS_Face tst::silhouette(TopoDS_Shape t, gp_Dir d) {
00122   TopoDS_Face s;
00123   //find angle between d and Z
00124   double theta = d.Angle(gp::DZ());
00125   //create a vector in YZ with same angle
00126   gp_Dir hDir(0,sin(theta),cos(theta));
00127   TopoDS_Compound edges = hlrLines(t,hDir); //get all the edges
00128   //TODO:transform the result to be normal to pose
00129   TopoDS_Wire w = outermost(edges);
00130   BRepBuilderAPI_MakeFace mf(w);
00131   if (mf.IsDone()) {
00132     s = mf.Face();
00133   } else {
00134     s.Nullify();
00135     uio::infoMsg("error, cannot make face from outermost wire");
00136   }
00137   return s;
00138 }
00139 
00145 TopoDS_Wire tst::outermost(TopoDS_Compound h) {
00146   //bounding box. shape is laying along the y axis
00147   Bnd_Box bbox;
00148   double aXmin,aYmin,aZmin, aXmax,aYmax,aZmax;
00149   TopoDS_Wire w;  //this is what we return
00150   w.Nullify();
00151   BRepBndLib::Add (h, bbox);
00152   bbox.Get ( aXmin,aYmin,aZmin, aXmax,aYmax,aZmax ); //we only need the Y's
00153 
00154   //points on tool axis
00155   gp_Pnt pa(0,aYmin-1.0,0),pb(0,aYmax+1.0,0);
00156 
00157   nearestEdges keepA,keepB; //edge(s) to keep at ends A and B
00158   keepA = findNearestEdges(h,BRepBuilderAPI_MakeVertex(pa));
00159   keepB = findNearestEdges(h,BRepBuilderAPI_MakeVertex(pb));
00160   //TODO: abort if we don't find anything at one end (i.e. keepA.n==0)
00161   TopTools_ListOfShape lsh;
00162 
00163   TopExp_Explorer Ex(h,TopAbs_EDGE);
00164   while (Ex.More()) { //check end points so we know what to do with the edge
00165     bool aA,bA,aB,bB;
00166     twopnts curr;
00167     curr = getEnds(TopoDS::Edge(Ex.Current()));
00168     aA = cmpPntPnts(curr.a,keepA.c,keepA.d); //true for match
00169     bA = cmpPntPnts(curr.b,keepA.c,keepA.d);
00170     aB = cmpPntPnts(curr.a,keepB.c,keepB.d);
00171     bB = cmpPntPnts(curr.b,keepB.c,keepB.d);
00172     if ( (aA && bA) || (aB && bB) ) {
00173       //both ends of this edge match the points at one end of the tool, so we don't want it
00174     } else {
00175       if ( (aA && (aB||bB)) || (bA && (aB||bB)) ){
00176         //matches both ends of the tool
00177         lsh.Append(Ex.Current());
00178       } else {
00179         //matches zero or one points. discard (for now)
00180         //TODO: may need to use these edges in some cases
00181         //warn potential problem
00182         //FILE_LOG(logWARN) << "__FILE__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ __LINE__ Discarding line that matches < 2 points";
00183       }
00184     }
00185     Ex.Next();
00186   }
00187   //append edges from the ends
00188   lsh.Append(keepA.a);
00189   if (keepA.n == 2)
00190     lsh.Append(keepA.b);
00191   lsh.Append(keepB.a);
00192   if (keepB.n == 2)
00193     lsh.Append(keepB.b);
00194 
00195   //make closed wire:
00196 
00197   //take first edge from lsh and put in a wire, remove it from lsh
00198   TopoDS_Edge e = TopoDS::Edge(lsh.First());
00199   lsh.RemoveFirst();
00200   twopnts ends = getEnds(e);
00201   BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire mw(e);
00202   TopTools_ListIteratorOfListOfShape iter;
00203   bool finished = false;
00204 
00205   //go through the rest of the edges, adding them to the wire in order
00206   //note - a while loop, nested inside a do-while loop
00207   int dwcnt = 0;
00208   do {
00209     int listsize = lsh.Extent();
00210     iter.Initialize(lsh);
00211     int whcnt = 0;
00212     while (iter.More()) {
00213       whcnt++;
00214       if (whcnt > 500) break;
00215       cout << "check an edge..." << endl;
00216       //add that edge to wire, remove from lsh
00217       e = TopoDS::Edge(iter.Value());
00218       twopnts currentEnds = getEnds(e);
00219       if (!currentEnds.e) { //no error
00220         //check for a match and update 'ends'
00221         bool match = false;
00222         if (cmpPntPnts(currentEnds.a,ends)) { /* currentEnds.a matches, so replace one of
00223           'ends' with currentEnds.b - but which one? */
00224           if (samepnt(currentEnds.a,ends.a))
00225             ends.a = currentEnds.b;
00226           else
00227             ends.b = currentEnds.b;
00228           match = true;
00229         }
00230         if (cmpPntPnts(currentEnds.b,ends)) {
00231           if (samepnt(currentEnds.b,ends.a))
00232             ends.a = currentEnds.a;
00233           else
00234             ends.b = currentEnds.a;
00235           match = true;
00236         }
00237         if (match){
00238           lsh.Remove(iter);
00239           mw.Add(e);
00240           break;
00241         }
00242       } else { //error while finding ends
00243         lsh.Remove(iter);
00244         break;
00245       }
00246     }
00247     if ( (ends.a.SquareDistance(ends.b) < 1e-10) || //too loose for BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire?
00248               (lsh.IsEmpty()) ) {
00249       finished = true;
00250     }
00251     dwcnt++;
00252     if ( (lsh.Extent() == listsize) && (dwcnt > 50) ) break;
00253   } while (!finished);
00254 
00255   if (!lsh.IsEmpty()) {
00256     //FIXME:error
00257   } else if (!mw.IsDone()) {
00258     //FIXME:error
00259   } else if (!finished) {
00260     //FIXME:error
00261   } else {
00262     w = mw.Wire();
00263   }
00264   /*if (!w.IsClosed()) {
00265   //FIXME:error
00266   }  */
00267   return w;
00268 }
00269 
00270 bool tst::samepnt(gp_Pnt a, gp_Pnt b) {
00271   if (a.SquareDistance(b) < 1e-10)
00272     return true;
00273   else
00274     return false;
00275 }
00276 
00281 twopnts tst::getEnds (TopoDS_Edge e) {
00282   TopExp_Explorer vx(e,TopAbs_VERTEX);
00283   twopnts tp;
00284   int v = 0;
00285   gp_Pnt prev;
00286   tp.e = true;
00287   for (;vx.More();vx.Next()) { //compare vertices; if they match, error. also error if >2 vertices
00288     v++;
00289     if (v == 1) {
00290       tp.a = BRep_Tool::Pnt( TopoDS::Vertex(vx.Current()) );
00291     } else if (v == 2) {
00292       tp.b = BRep_Tool::Pnt( TopoDS::Vertex(vx.Current()) );
00293       if ( tp.a.SquareDistance( tp.b ) > 1e-10 ) {
00294         tp.e = false;  //not the same point, so no error unless there are more vertices
00295       }
00296     }
00297   }
00298   if (v > 2) {
00299     tp.e = true;
00300     cout << "getends - " << v << " vertices." << endl;
00301     BRepTools::Dump(e,std::cout);
00302     //cout << "v = " << v << ". point
00303   }
00304   return tp;
00305 }

00309   double d1=0,d2=0;
00310   twopnts tp;
00311   Handle ( Geom_Curve ) C = BRep_Tool::Curve ( e,d1,d2 );
00312   if ( d1 == d2 ) {
00313     tp.a=gp::Origin();
00314     tp.b=gp::Origin();
00315     //BRepTools::Dump(e,std::cout);
00316     cout << "failed to find ends" << endl;
00317     } else {
00318       cout << "found ends: " << d1 << "," << d2 << endl;
00319       tp.a=C->Value ( d1 );
00320       tp.b=C->Value ( d2 );
00321     }
00322     return tp;
00323     }
00324     */
00325 
00331 bool tst::cmpPntPnts(gp_Pnt c,gp_Pnt p1,gp_Pnt p2) {
00332   if ( (c.SquareDistance(p1) < 1e-10) //square distance is faster. actual distance would be .00001
00333     || (c.SquareDistance(p2) < 1e-10) )
00334     return true;
00335   else
00336     return false;
00337 }
00338 
00344 inline bool tst::cmpPntPnts(gp_Pnt c,twopnts tp) {
00345   return cmpPntPnts(c,tp.a,tp.b);
00346 }
00347 
00353 nearestEdges tst::findNearestEdges(TopoDS_Shape s, TopoDS_Shape t) {
00354   //TopoDS_Compound elements;
00355   //BRep_Builder bld;
00356   nearestEdges ne;
00357   ne.n = 0;
00358   ne.e = false;
00359   BRepExtrema_DistShapeShape dss(s,t);
00360   if (dss.NbSolution() == 1) {        //one edge
00361     ne.n = 1;
00362     ne.a = TopoDS::Edge(dss.SupportOnShape1(1)); //starts counting at 0, right?
00363   } else if (dss.NbSolution() == 2) {   //certain angles could cause two edges to be coincident
00364     uio::infoMsg("Error, can't solve with two edges");
00365     ne.e = true;
00366     //FIXME:how the $%#%^%$&^$ do we solve this?!
00367     //-->if only one is an arc, choose that one; if both are, choose the one with largest radius
00368     //if one is a non-circular arc, or if neither is an arc then it becomes really difficult...
00369   } else if (dss.NbSolution() == 3) {   //2 edges, 1 point - engraving tool?
00370     //only want edges
00371     TopoDS_Edge tmp;
00372     for(int i=0; i<dss.NbSolution();i++) {
00373       if (dss.SupportTypeShape1(i) == BRepExtrema_IsOnEdge ) {
00374         tmp = TopoDS::Edge(dss.SupportOnShape1(i+1));
00375         if (ne.n == 0) {
00376           ne.a = tmp;
00377           ne.n++;
00378         } else if (ne.n == 1) {
00379           ne.b = tmp;
00380           ne.n++;
00381         } else {
00382           ne.e = true;
00383           uio::infoMsg("Error, too many edges - max 2");
00384         }
00385       }
00386     }
00387   } else if (dss.NbSolution() == 4) {   //combination of #2 and #3 above
00388     uio::infoMsg("Error, can't solve with four edges");
00389     ne.e = true;
00390   } else { //shouldn't get here
00391     ne.e = true;
00392     uio::infoMsg("Error! Cannot find nearest elements, given " + uio::stringify(dss.NbSolution()) + " solutions.");
00393   }
00394   if (!ne.e) {
00395     //no errors, so figure out the endpoints
00396     double d1=0,d2=0;
00397     gp_Pnt p1,p2;
00398     //Standard_Real first, last;
00399     Handle ( Geom_Curve ) C = BRep_Tool::Curve ( ne.a,d1,d2 );
00400     /*
00401     std::stringstream ss;
00402     ss << "n: " << ne.n << " e: " << ne.e << " c: " << uio::toString(ne.c) << " d: " << uio::toString(ne.d) << " C: " << &C << std::endl;
00403     ss << " d1: " << d1 << " &ne: " << &ne << " &ne.n: " << &(ne.n) << &ne.n << " &ne.e: " << &(ne.e) << std::endl;
00404     ss << ne.meminfo();
00405     if (ne.a.IsNull()) ss << "ne.a is null" << std::endl;
00406     else ss << "ne.a not null" << std::endl;
00407     //uio::infoMsg(ss.str());
00408     cout << ss.str();
00409     */
00410     if (d1 == d2) {
00411       cout << "params zero - skipping" << endl;
00412       ne.e = true;
00413       BRepAdaptor_Curve adaptor = BRepAdaptor_Curve ( ne.a );
00414       if ( adaptor.GetType() ==GeomAbs_Circle ) {
00415         cout << "Arc" << endl;
00416       } else if ( adaptor.GetType() ==GeomAbs_Line ) {
00417         cout << "Line" << endl;
00418       } else cout << "Edge" << endl;
00419       //BRepTools::Dump(ne.a,std::cout);
00420     } else {
00421       cout << "ends: " << d1 << "," << d2 << endl;
00422       p1=C->Value ( d1 );
00423       p2=C->Value ( d2 );
00424       if (ne.n == 1) {
00425         ne.c = p1;
00426         ne.d = p2;
00427       } else {
00428         gp_Pnt p3,p4;
00429         C = BRep_Tool::Curve ( ne.b,d1,d2 );
00430         p3 = C->Value(d1);
00431         p4 = C->Value(d2);
00432         /*
00433         compare the points; p1 or p2 should match one of p3, p4.
00434         *must* have 3 unique points, so find two that match
00435         and then look for another (problem if found)
00436         */
00437         //alternate: use a line between the outlier points and find all edges that intersect it?
00438         int matches = 0;
00439         if (p1.SquareDistance(p3) < 1e-10) {
00440           matches++;
00441           ne.c = p2;
00442           ne.d = p4;
00443         }
00444         if (p1.SquareDistance(p4) < 1e-10) {
00445           matches++;
00446           ne.c = p2;
00447           ne.d = p3;
00448         }
00449         if (p2.SquareDistance(p3) < 1e-10) {
00450           matches++;
00451           ne.c = p1;
00452           ne.d = p4;
00453         }
00454         if (p2.SquareDistance(p4) < 1e-10) {
00455           matches++;
00456           ne.c = p1;
00457           ne.d = p3;
00458         }
00459         if (matches < 1) {
00460           uio::infoMsg("Error, no matches");
00461         }
00462         if (matches > 1) {
00463           uio::infoMsg("Error, too many points coincident: " + uio::stringify(matches));
00464         }
00465       }
00466     }
00467   }
00468   return ne;
00469 }
00470 
00478 TopoDS_Compound tst::hlrLines(TopoDS_Shape t, gp_Dir dir) {
00479   gp_Pnt viewpnt(0,0,1);  //probably doesn't matter what this point is
00480   gp_Dir xDir(-1,0,0);
00481   gp_Trsf pTrsf;
00482   pTrsf.SetTransformation(gp_Ax3(viewpnt,dir,xDir));
00483   Handle(HLRBRep_Algo) myAlgo = new HLRBRep_Algo();
00484   myAlgo->Add(t);
00485   myAlgo->Projector(HLRAlgo_Projector (pTrsf,false,0));
00486   myAlgo->Update();
00487   myAlgo->Hide(); //from pdf
00488   myAlgo->Update(); //just in case
00489 
00490   HLRBRep_HLRToShape aHLRToShape(myAlgo);
00491 
00492   TopoDS_Compound comp;
00493   BRep_Builder builder;
00494   builder.MakeCompound( comp );
00495   TopoDS_Shape VCompound = aHLRToShape.VCompound();
00496   if(!VCompound.IsNull())
00497     builder.Add(comp, VCompound);
00498   TopoDS_Shape Rg1LineVCompound = aHLRToShape.Rg1LineVCompound();
00499   if(!Rg1LineVCompound.IsNull())
00500     builder.Add(comp, Rg1LineVCompound);
00501   TopoDS_Shape RgNLineVCompound = aHLRToShape.RgNLineVCompound();
00502   if(!RgNLineVCompound.IsNull())
00503     builder.Add(comp, RgNLineVCompound);
00504   TopoDS_Shape OutLineVCompound = aHLRToShape.OutLineVCompound();
00505   if(!OutLineVCompound.IsNull())
00506     builder.Add(comp, OutLineVCompound);
00507   TopoDS_Shape IsoLineVCompound = aHLRToShape.IsoLineVCompound();
00508   if(!IsoLineVCompound.IsNull())
00509     builder.Add(comp, IsoLineVCompound);
00510   TopoDS_Shape HCompound = aHLRToShape.HCompound();
00511   if(!HCompound.IsNull())
00512     builder.Add(comp, HCompound);
00513   TopoDS_Shape Rg1LineHCompound = aHLRToShape.Rg1LineHCompound();
00514   if(!Rg1LineHCompound.IsNull())
00515     builder.Add(comp, Rg1LineHCompound);
00516   TopoDS_Shape RgNLineHCompound = aHLRToShape.RgNLineHCompound();
00517   if(!RgNLineHCompound.IsNull())
00518     builder.Add(comp, RgNLineHCompound);
00519   TopoDS_Shape OutLineHCompound = aHLRToShape.OutLineHCompound();
00520   if(!OutLineHCompound.IsNull())
00521     builder.Add(comp, OutLineHCompound);
00522   TopoDS_Shape IsoLineHCompound = aHLRToShape.IsoLineHCompound();
00523   if(!IsoLineHCompound.IsNull())
00524     builder.Add(comp, IsoLineHCompound);
00525 
00526   //get rid of any edges whose endpoints are coincident
00527   TopoDS_Compound e;
00528   builder.MakeCompound(e);
00529   TopExp_Explorer ex(comp,TopAbs_EDGE);
00530   TopExp_Explorer vx;
00531   int ec = 0, vc = 0; //edge and vertex count
00532   for (;ex.More();ex.Next()) {
00533     ec++;
00534     vx.Init(TopoDS::Edge(ex.Current()),TopAbs_VERTEX);
00535     int v = 0;
00536     gp_Pnt prev;
00537     bool discard = true;
00538     for (;vx.More();vx.Next()) { //compare vertices; if they match, error. also error if >2 vertices
00539       v++;
00540       if (v == 1) {
00541         prev = BRep_Tool::Pnt( TopoDS::Vertex(vx.Current()) );
00542       } else /*if (v == 2)*/ {
00543         if ( prev.SquareDistance( BRep_Tool::Pnt( TopoDS::Vertex(vx.Current()) ) ) > 1e-10 ) {
00544           discard = false;  //not the same point, so we keep this edge
00545         }
00546       }
00547       vc += v; //add current vertex count to total
00548     }
00549     if (discard) {
00550       cout << "skipped zero-length edge" << endl;
00551     } else {
00552       builder.Add(e,ex.Current());
00553     }
00554   }
00555   cout << "hlrLines - " << ec << " edges, " << vc << " vertices." << endl;
00556   return e;
00557 }
00558 
00559 double tst::mass(TopoDS_Shape s) {
00560   double m;
00561   GProp_GProps System;
00562   BRepGProp::VolumeProperties ( s,System );
00563   m = System.Mass();
00564   //cout << "Mass " << m << endl;
00565   return m;
00566 }
00567 
00568 TopoDS_Wire tst::halfProf() {
00569   double r = .25;
00570   double len = 3;
00571 
00572   //build half
00573   Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) Tc;
00574   double rsqrt = r / sqrt(2.0); //for midpoint of circle
00575   Tc = GC_MakeArcOfCircle (gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(rsqrt,0,r-rsqrt), gp_Pnt(0,0,0));
00576   TopoDS_Edge Ec = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(Tc);
00577   TopoDS_Edge E1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(r,0,len));
00578   TopoDS_Edge E2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(0,0,0), gp_Pnt(0,0,len));
00579   TopoDS_Edge E3 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(0,0,len), gp_Pnt(r,0,len));
00580   BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire wm(Ec,E1,E2,E3);
00581   return wm.Wire();
00582 }
00583 
00584 nearestEdges::nearestEdges() {
00585   n=0;
00586   a.Nullify();
00587   b.Nullify();
00588   c=gp::Origin();
00589   d=gp::Origin();
00590   e=false;
00591 }

00593 std::string nearestEdges::meminfo() {
00594   std::stringstream ss;
00595   ss << "meminfo n: " << n << " e: " << e << " &ne: " << this << " &ne.n: " << &n << " &ne.e: " << &e << std::endl;
00596   return ss.str();
